actions: Checked for missing values in critical fields (age, email, join_date)
Validated data types and formats (age, salary, join_date, email, is_active)
Generated validation reports in Markdown, HTML, JSON
Saved annotated dataset and reports to GitHub output folder
auto_corrections: Trimmed whitespace from all string fields
Standardized boolean values where clear (e.g., 'yes' to 'true')
manual_review_required: Rows with complex schema errors (age, salary, join_date, email)
